attributes.action: Free nursery places for children who's families are working but who are in a low income
attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned feel it is unfair that our children have to go without free nursery places for 2yr olds because we choose to work but still are on a low income.

We ask the government to address the following:-

1- that free child nursery placed for 2yr olds are available for all children who's parents work but are on a low income and not just those on benefits. Decided by the way of means testing incomes
2- that our children aren't penalised because we choose to work instead of claiming benefits even though the money value is pretty much the same
3- that our children don't miss out on essential social skills and development which the would receive should they be given free nursery places.

Parents that work and who are on a low income should be allowed the free places for their children.
My child is missing out on 1 year of social skills and learning because we choose to work and earn. Lets make working pay!!
